players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and found them to be the mafia. Alice was killed by the mafia. Vote for Diana to stop the killings."
You: "I suspect Charlie because he claims Diana is mafia. Vote for Charlie."
Diana: "I think Bob is the real mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Bob, you can't be mafia because you didn't get killed. Diana, you know I'm detective."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "..."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana and found them to be the mafia. Alice was killed by the mafia. Vote for Diana to stop the killings."
Bob: "I suspect Charlie because he claims Diana is mafia. Vote for Charlie."
Diana: "I think Bob is the real mafia."
You: "I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Bob, you can't be mafia because you didn't get killed. Diana, you know I'm detective."
Bob: remained silent.
Diana: "..."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and found them to be the mafia. Alice was killed by the mafia. Vote for Diana to stop the killings."
Bob: "I suspect Charlie because he claims Diana is mafia. Vote for Charlie."
You: "I think Bob is the real mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and found she is mafia. Bob, you can't be mafia because you didn't get killed. Diana, you know I'm detective."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
